My name is [Lin Shen](http://weibo.com/linshen2011) (In Chinese naming order) and this is my personal blog about my life and technology, and anything else I find time to write about. 

I'm an Android software enginner, also I'm a vlogger who logs everything I like.

You can follow me on these platforms:
